document_data.name: Elthaulin
document_data.titles: Master of Doom, New Voice of Bane
document_data.mainbody: '''Elthaulin''' was a [[Zhentarim]] priest of [[Bane]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Elthaulin was ambitious, fanatic, self-important, and manipulative.
document_data.Abilities: One of his spells allowed his voice to reverberate loudly.
document_data.Activities: As an upperpriest, Elthaulin carried out a number of rites for the Temple of Bane.
document_data.Relationships: He had a rivalry with [[Fzoul Chembryl]], whom he absolutely hated, seeking to kill and replace him.
